title: Kereska's Favour
content:
Kereska's Favour Level 4 Evocation Spell Imbue yourself with elemental energy sourced from the draconic goddess, Kereska. Short Rest Action Level 4 Spell Slot

Kereska's Favour

Level 4 Evocation Spell

Imbue yourself with elemental energy sourced from the draconic goddess, Kereska.

Kereska's Favour is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Kereska's Favour can only be granted by by Markoheshkir. Kereska's Favour is a Lvl 4 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies,
